verses.name: Jeremiah 5:24
verses.text: Neither say they in their heart, Let us now fear the Lord our God, that giveth rain, both the former and the latter, in his season: he reserveth unto us the appointed weeks of the harvest.

verses.name: Jeremiah 5:25
verses.text: Your iniquities have turned away these things, and your sins have withholden good things from you.

verses.name: Jeremiah 5:26
verses.text: For among my people are found wicked men: they lay wait, as he that setteth snares; they set a trap, they catch men.

verses.name: Jeremiah 5:27
verses.text: As a cage is full of birds, so are their houses full of deceit: therefore they are become great, and waxen rich.
